nodes.text: Doane Watki was a Human female who lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. She was the podracer champion of the Valarian gang. Circa 1 ABY, Barada, Jabba the Hutt's chief mechanic, hired a spacer to investigate the Valarian Pod Racers Bunker because he suspected the Valarian podracer pilots to cheat. He eventually ordered the assassination of Doane Watki.
